```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dygraphs)
library(xts)
library(MASS)
library(caret)

rmse<-function(eps)
{
	return(round(sqrt(mean(eps^2,na.rm=TRUE)),digits=0))
}

mape<-function(y,ychap)
{
	return(round(100*mean(abs(y-ychap)/abs(y)),digits=2))
}

```
